articles.title: Oppo A38 leaks in full with specs and renders - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The phone should launch next month in Europe with a starting price of €159. Oppo is working on a new affordable midranger called A38. Images of the device...
articles.content: Oppo is working on a new affordable midranger called A38. Images of the device leaked online, along with key specs, revealing the phone will feature a dual camera and the rear aesthetics of other rec… [+846 chars]
